column1: Table 5: B pocket structures of reference panel alleles.

column2: 1. Based on data presented in Saper et al, and Madden (see Methods), the MHC residues utilized as constituting the B pocket are: 7, 9, 24, 34, 45, 63, 66,
67, 70, and 99. Key residues are those in positions 9, 45, 63, 66, 67, 70, and 99.
